SEARCH
Package access.application

Class ApplicationHandler

java.lang.Object
access.application.ApplicationHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
ApplicantApplicationFeatures, ManagerApplicationFeatures, OfficerApplicationFeatures
public class ApplicationHandler extends Object implements ManagerApplicationFeatures, OfficerApplicationFeatures, ApplicantApplicationFeatures
Handles all application-related operations in the BTO Management System. Implements interfaces for managers, officers, and applicants to provide appropriate access control to application data and operations based on user roles.

      public List<Application> getAllApplications()

      Returns:
      A list of all Application objects

    • approveApplication

      public void approveApplication(String applicationId)
      Approves an application by changing its status to SUCCESSFUL. Available to managers as part of the application approval process.
      Specified by:
      approveApplication in interface ManagerApplicationFeatures
      Parameters:
      applicationId - The ID of the application to approve
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if application is not found

      Returns:

    • processApplication

      public void processApplication(String applicationId)
      Processes an approved application by changing its status to BOOKED. Available to officers for completing the post-approval booking process.
      Specified by:
      processApplication in interface OfficerApplicationFeatures
      Parameters:
      applicationId - The ID of the application to process
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if application is not found or not in SUCCESSFUL status

    • generateReceipt

      public String generateReceipt(String applicationId)
      Generates a receipt for a booked application. Available to officers to provide booking confirmation to applicants.
      Specified by:
      generateReceipt in interface OfficerApplicationFeatures
      Parameters:
      applicationId - The ID of the application
      Returns:
      A string containing the receipt information
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if application is not found or not in BOOKED status

    • getApplicationsForApplicant

      Parameters:

    • findApplicationById

      private Application findApplicationById(String applicationId)
      Finds an application by its ID. Helper method used by various public methods that require finding specific applications.
      Parameters:
      applicationId - The ID of the application to find
      Returns:
      The Application object with the specified ID, or null if not found

    • generateUniqueId

      private String generateUniqueId(String prefix)
      Generates a unique ID for a new application. Creates IDs in the format: [prefix]-[timestamp] to ensure uniqueness.
      Parameters:
      prefix - The prefix to use for the ID (e.g., "APP")
      Returns:
      A unique ID string
